documents.document: First glance, I thought this was Jamie @CreateIsolate https://t.co/8XwdBYb73X

Daughter was stymied, on visiting @IrlEmbParis -had paperwork rejected, as they said they could tell she'd printed stuff herself (she had cos she's a young, paperless type), as there was no folds from being posted in an envelope. So remember to rough up your documents! https://t.co/rSoeOSgaRU
@mainbanana @LegoLostAtSea Loved it there-only place I ever went on holiday as kid.
@jabberworks I was gonna go with grey chalk paint, but you've reminded me that I can still dream.
@rickygervais Just what I needed today. Thank you.
@EMaxfieldMoen @KTMcCormick2 Been doing sublingual immunotherapy drops treatment for years- life changing/saving @StallergenesCom

I've bought a lot of random stuff in charity shops over the years, but bearing in mind that I can barely even play the recorder- this was ambitious of me. @KateRobbins #hoarders https://t.co/q0V5pyY26r
#BorisJohnson is taking the piss- he doesn't care, cos he doesn't have to. #BorisTheLiar #BorisOut #untouchable https://t.co/DisRffu6qF
@ShobnaGulati Can't like that, but hear you.
He has no respect for anybody.#BorisOut https://t.co/tItZHou6zN
@stevedouglas76 @carolecadwalla I think it'd be all the sweeter. #untouchables
Reminds me of @JaneFallon - not the arrest aspect obvs! #Caturday #CatsOfTwitter https://t.co/I3L6wTtdwk
@SoozUK I can help him out there.

@Evetssteve4 Went there when they first built it, except it wasn't finished- just a muddy field! Also, I remember when #THORPEPARK was just a gravel pit, played there-couldn't swim. #childcare #dontcomebacktillteatime

@rickygervais What I did was treat the 10 euro, junk yard pouf as most prized furniture-then be affronted/go mental when it is slashed to ribbons, thus making it the preferred target whist detracting attention from the leather chairs. #cats #mindgames
@IanBrownTV @graffeg_books @midaspr @AlbertTortoise @booksaremybag @IndieBookshopUK Just ordered this to send 'Down Under'.
FFS, somebody remind Tracy that she's a murderer! #coronationstreet @itvcorrie
@nicoleyc17 @forest_fr1ends I trimmed the photo with scissors.
@BrendonHope Maybe you should follow back more.
@kingtorc Reminds me of my late mother's shopping lists: Vodka Quiche Cat food
@SaucySeventies How nice to see natural teeth.

@SaucySeventies I remember the lads being delighted at finding some mags in hedge during (1970s) cross country run, but all I could think, to this day, is who was looking at porn in bushes of school field. Hopefully, just older lads dropped them during their run?
The true measure of a man ....#perfidious https://t.co/35vcRjUQ6Y
@nicoleyc17 @forest_fr1ends It was in album for 10 years.
@RealKirstOBrien I was thinking about him just t'other day- he was such a memorable character.
@forest_fr1ends About 10 years after back in the day when you could take pix in bath with yer kids, I noticed my husband's 'finger' floating in the bubbles on photo I'd shown to all the family.
@charlesTdale I recommend leaving a note on windscreen, along lines of 'sorry if I scratched your car with my pushchair, but....'
@Carol4OliveFarm @leonmac44 Maybe they just wanted to stand out from all the Marys-my g-grandmother from Donegal was called Sydney.

@LegoLostAtSea I rarely get to a beach, but always try to pick up plastic when I do. I've noticed a lot of those bits of plastic, showing dress size, that clip onto coat hangers. Do you have a collection for us?
@FunnySuzyB They've rung my door and my home phone, here in France , "to speak, in English, about Jesus"! How did they know? I live in big town!
@LegoLostAtSea @samanthafook Yea, I found a tin of those pins in my late mum's drawer.
@PhilMews 'Ne'er cast a clout, 'til May be out'!
@reece_dinsdale You're so good- when that darkness crosses Paul's face!
@LegoLostAtSea That's shocking. How much beach did you walk?
@LegoLostAtSea Yesterday? This is a day's worth?!
@TVSanjeev @ChrisLangWriter @UnforgottenTV 'im indoors is watching it with me at last. First time he's ever talked about what might be about to happen in a TV show! #whodunnit
@forest_fr1ends 50 years on, I can still play 'God Save the Queen' and 'We 3 Kings' and I make sure that I do every Xmas
@georgemelies192 @leekern13 I remember cheating claims at the time, which were obviously poo-pooed, but does the 45K mean she wasn't lying?
@leekern13 It's been a long slog https://t.co/faZlG0tIwR
@russell_kane Can you not show your lovely, full set of teeth, it's triggering me as I have genetic defect and only have 18.
